definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Other relevant documents, such as flow diagrams, equipment specification, statistical.
sentences.chinese: 其他相关文件，如流程图，设备规格书，统计表。

sentences.english: A process flow diagram is provided in each Knowledge Area chapter.
sentences.chinese: 介绍知识领域的各章，绘有过程流程图。

sentences.english: This paper proposses a cost-effective software design of BLDCM, and some procedure flow charts of main program subroutine are offered.
sentences.chinese: 详细列出无刷直流电机双闭环控制器软件程序流程图。

sentences.english: Diagrammer is the one-product solution for your diagramming needs.
sentences.chinese: 是一个为您的所有流程图的需要解决方案。

sentences.english: You can move the rectangle representing the screen to scroll the diagram.
sentences.chinese: 您可以移动表示屏幕的矩形以滚动流程图。

sentences.english: And the C-language data structure and flow charts are given.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了控件的C语言数据结构和工作流程图。

sentences.english: Finally, the system flow chart diagram and procedures.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了系统框图和程序流程图。

sentences.english: Flowcharts facilitate communication between programmers and business people.
sentences.chinese: 流程图方便市民之间的沟通程序员和业务。

sentences.english: The flow chart to complete the automatic tuning function is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了实现整个自动调谐功能的程序流程图。

sentences.english: From each high-level step, "drill down" to a more detailed flowchart on a new page.
sentences.chinese: 从每一高级步骤，“深入”到新页上更详细的流程图。

sentences.english: Finally, the program flow chart of one-step forming is given.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了一步成形模拟算法的程序流程图。

sentences.english: The software flow chart as well as some key subprogram is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文给出了系统的软件流程图和部分重要的子程序。

sentences.english: In flowcharting, a connector which illustrates continuation of a broken flowline.
sentences.chinese: 流程图中的一个单元的方框。

sentences.english: This is where flowcharts come to the rescue.
sentences.chinese: 这就需要流程图来解围了。

sentences.english: See a larger image of this flowchart.
sentences.chinese: 查看这个流程图的大版本。

sentences.english: This thesis also displays the flow charts and circuit diagram of part of the software of the whole system.
sentences.chinese: 本文还给出了整个系统的部分软件流程图和电路图。

definition: course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
